title: Weekly Product Pulse: Key User Feedback (Nov 17-23, 2025)
overview: This weekly product pulse highlights critical user feedback from November 17-23, 2025. Key areas of concern include persistent technical glitches, increasing dissatisfaction with fees, and significant challenges accessing effective customer support, impacting overall user experience and platform trust.

themes.name: Glitches & Bugs
themes.summary: Users express significant frustration with pervasive technical issues, from chart malfunctions and order execution problems to data inconsistencies, severely impacting platform reliability.

themes.name: Fees & Charges
themes.summary: A negative sentiment persists regarding high and increasing charges, particularly brokerage fees, leading users to consider competitor platforms due to perceived unfavorable pricing.

themes.name: Customer Support
themes.summary: Users consistently report extreme difficulty connecting with and receiving effective assistance from customer support, resulting in unaddressed critical issues and declining user confidence.

actions: Prioritize investigation and resolution of critical chart and order execution bugs to stabilize core platform functionality.
Review current fee structures and conduct a competitive analysis to address user concerns about high charges and potential churn.
Implement immediate measures to improve customer support accessibility and responsiveness, focusing on reducing wait times and improving issue resolution rates.
